articles.title: Jack Higgins obituary - The Guardian
articles.description: Bestselling author who achieved huge success with his 1975 wartime thriller The Eagle Has Landed
articles.content: Under his own and several other names, including Jack Higgins, Harry Patterson had published 35 thrillers before, in his mid-40s, he hit the jackpot with The Eagle Has Landed (1975), an instant bests… [+9331 chars]
